line_1: To mock and jeer and scoff
line_2: The LORD shall cut them off.

line_1: But she, perhaps, at me will scoff,
line_2: Besides, she lives a great way off:

line_1: Our Venus too, without a scoff,
line_2: Shines brightest when she's farthest off;

line_1: And made her all the Circle's Scoff:
line_2: In short, Eugenio play'd her off,
